description:
At Hale & Monico, we are good at what we do. We are based in Chicago, Illinois, and have a proven track record of winning medical malpractice, civil rights and personal injury cases. Our results speak for themselves, as the team at our law firm has returned tens of millions of dollars to people who have experienced the unthinkable. Several of our successes include the following:

• An $11 million award for a client who suffered a brain injury due to a defective ladder
• A $10.5 million for a state trooper who was injured due to a sleeping truck driver
• A $5 million settlement for the children of an innocent woman who was killed as the result of a police chase

"Dedicated" describes the team at our law firm perfectly. When we say we are committed to our clients, we mean it. We always seek maximum compensation, and we go even beyond that. From the start, we seek to ease our clients' minds. We offer free initial consultations at our office, in their homes, in the hospital or anywhere else convenient for them.

As seasoned trial attorneys, we are more than comfortable pursuing justice in the courtroom. We have a reputation as a law firm that uses innovative technology and creative strategies to reach our clients' goals. Our team has decades of combined experience holding people, insurance providers and corporations accountable for the damages they cause our clients. Hale & Monico lawyers have been featured in the media for their accomplishments as well as sought after for their legal opinion on current events.
